mapper.select: select distinct gh_call_system.c_group from gh_call_system group by gh_call_system.c_id
mapper.insert:
insert into gh_call_system (c_id, c_user, c_group, c_account, c_pass, c_webaccount, c_webpass, c_phone1, c_phone2, c_phone3, c_phone4, c_operator, c_num, c_state, c_b1,c_b2,c_b3, c_b4, c_b5, c_b6) values
(#{callSystem.cId},#{callSystem.cUser},#{callSystem.cGroup},#{callSystem.cAccount},#{callSystem.cPass},#{callSystem.cWebaccount}, #{callSystem.cWebpass},#{callSystem.cPhone1},#{callSystem.cPhone2},#{callSystem.cPhone3},#{callSystem.cPhone4}, #{callSystem.cOperator}, #{callSystem.cNum},#{callSystem.cState},#{callSystem.cB1},#{callSystem.cB2}, #{callSystem.cB3},#{callSystem.cB4},#{callSystem.cB5},#{callSystem.cB6})
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from gh_call_system
order by ${orderByClause}
